You are chatting with an assistant that can help with various tasks on Service Savvy.
How do I register an account on Service Savvy?
To register an account on Service Savvy, click on the 'Sign Up' button on the homepage. You'll need to provide some basic information like your name, email address, and create a password.
I forgot my password. What should I do?
If you've forgotten your password, click on the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page. You'll be asked to enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
How can I update my account information?
To update your account information, first log in to your account. Then, navigate to the 'Account Settings' section where you can update your username, email address, and password.
Where can I find FAQs?
You can find our Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) in the 'Help' or 'Support' section of our website. The FAQs cover common questions and guides on using the platform.
How do I submit a help desk ticket?

To submit a help desk ticket, go to the 'Support' or 'Help' section and click on 'Submit a Ticket'. Fill in the required fields, provide as much detail as possible about your issue, and click 'Submit'. You'll receive a confirmation and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
How do I manage my service listing?

To manage your service listings, log in to your account and navigate to the 'My Services' section. Here, you can create new listings, edit existing ones, and update detailed information about the services you offer.
How do I post a project?

To post a project, navigate to the 'Post a Project' section. Fill in the project details, including a detailed description, required skills, budget, and timelines. Once you're done, click 'Post' and your project will be listed for freelancers to view and submit proposals.
How do I submit a proposal for a project?

To submit a proposal, first find a project you're interested in. Then, click on 'Submit Proposal' and fill in the details of your proposal, including your approach, bid amount, and timelines. Once you're done, click 'Submit'.
How do I track the progress of my project?
You can track the progress of your project in the 'My Projects' section. Here, you'll see a list of your projects and their current status. You can click on a project to view more details.
How do I edit or remove a project listing?

To edit or remove a project listing, go to the 'My Projects' section and find the project you want to edit or remove. Click on 'Edit' to make changes to the listing, or 'Remove' to delete the listing.
How do I rate a freelancer?
After a project is completed, you'll have the option to rate the freelancer. You can leave a star rating and write a review about your experience working with the freelancer.
How do I rate a client?
After a project is completed, you'll have the option to rate the client. You can leave a star rating and write a review about your experience working with the client.
How do I generate a rating badge?
Your rating badge is automatically generated based on the ratings you receive from clients. It will display your average rating and can be found on your profile page.
How do I filter feedback?
To filter feedback, go to the 'Feedback' section on your profile page. Here, you can sort feedback by rating, date, and whether the feedback is positive or negative.
How do I share my profile on social media?

To share your profile on social media, go to your profile page and click on the 'Share' button. You'll see options to share your profile on various social media platforms like Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, etc.
How do I turn on notifications?

To turn on notifications, go to the 'Account Settings' section and find the 'Notifications' settings. Here, you can choose which events you want to be notified about and how you want to receive these notifications.
How do I participate in the discussion forums?

To participate in the discussion forums, navigate to the 'Forums' section. Here, you can browse existing threads, start a new thread, or reply to posts. Remember to follow the forum rules and be respectful to other users.
How can I contact customer service?
You can reach our customer service at **1-800-123-4567**. They are available 24/7 and ready to assist you.
How can I contact Service Savvy customer service?
You can reach Service Savvy's customer service at **1-800-123-4567**. They are available 24/7 and ready to assist you.
How do I deactivate my account on Service Savvy?

To deactivate your account on Service Savvy, go to the 'Account Settings' section. Here, you'll find an option to deactivate your account. Please note that deactivating your account will permanently delete all your data and cannot be undone.
What are the benefits of premium membership on Service Savvy?

Premium membership on Service Savvy offers several benefits. These include priority customer support, increased visibility of your listings, access to premium projects, and more. For detailed benefits, please visit the 'Premium Membership' section on our website.
How do I report a user on Service Savvy?

If you encounter any inappropriate behavior or have any issues with a user on Service Savvy, you can report them by clicking on the 'Report User' button on their profile. Please provide as much detail as possible to help us investigate the issue.
How do I request a refund on Service Savvy?

To request a refund on Service Savvy, please contact our customer service at **1-800-123-4567** or send an email to **support@servicesavvy.com** with your refund request. Please include your order number and reason for the refund request in your message.
How do I change my payment method on Service Savvy?
To change your payment method on Service Savvy, go to the 'Account Settings' section and click on 'Payment Methods'. Here, you can add a new payment method or remove an existing one.
